Label.en: This is thanks mainly to the efforts of President Francois Mitterand
Label.fr: Notamment grâce aux initiatives du President Francois Mitterand
Label.es: This is thanks mainly to the efforts of President Francois Mitterand
Label.zh: This is thanks mainly to the efforts of President Francois Mitterand

Label.en: Famously, he is responsible for adding the famous pyramid
Label.fr: De façon notoire, il fit le choix d'ajouter la fameuse pyramide en verre au centre de la cour
Label.es: Famously, he is responsible for adding the famous pyramid
Label.zh: Famously, he is responsible for adding the famous pyramid

Label.en: And that's how it became what it is today!
Label.fr: Et voilà pourquoi, aujourd'hui, on voit ce qu'on voit !
Label.es: And that's how it became what it is today!
Label.zh: And that's how it became what it is today!

Label.en: If you want to learn more about the art inside, I have a whole special app for that!
Label.fr: Les oeuvres hébergées par le musée sont passionnantes. Je raconte leur histoire dans une app dédiée !
Label.es: If you want to learn more about the art inside, I have a whole special app for that!
Label.zh: If you want to learn more about the art inside, I have a whole special app for that!
